findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward STTReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges, including withdrawing tokens from the farm contract and vault contract using the inCaseTokensGetStuck function, and changing entrance fee factor, controller fee, and buyback rate.
